providers.name: ComplyAdvantage
key_features: Screen & monitor customers against sanctions, watchlists & PEPs
Screen & monitor customers against negative news
Verify business prospects and ensure it’s safe to do business with them
Monitor transactions for AML risk using rules & ML algorithms
Monitor transactions & events in real-time for fraud
Boost sanctions compliance, reduce false positives and improve efficiency
providers.summary: ComplyAdvantage is a leading provider of AI-driven fraud and AML risk detection solutions. They offer a range of solutions for customer onboarding, transaction risk monitoring, and more. Their key features include screening customers against sanctions and watchlists, monitoring transactions for AML risk, and reducing false positives.

providers.name: Ekata
key_features: Onboard more customers with higher confidence and lower friction
Assess identity risk, approve good transactions, and investigate fraud on a global scale
Maximize approval rates and fight payment fraud in every transaction
Validate and evaluate the risk of any address in the world
Verify the risk of a customer with phone metadata and associated locations, personas, and businesses
providers.summary: Ekata, a Mastercard company, offers solutions for account opening, identity verification, and KYC compliance. Their key features include onboarding more customers with higher confidence, assessing identity risk, and maximizing approval rates while fighting payment fraud.

Faster, better, and more cost-effective KYC
